description: Detects the use of NPS, a port forwarding and intranet penetration proxy server
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: PUA - NPS Tunneling Tool Execution
query: ((process.executable.text:"*\\npc.exe") OR ((process.command_line.text:"*\ \-server\=*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-vkey\=*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-password\=*")) OR (process.command_line.text:"*\ \-config\=npc*") OR (((winlog.event_data.Hashes:(*MD5\=AE8ACF66BFE3A44148964048B826D005* OR *SHA1\=CEA49E9B9B67F3A13AD0BE1C2655293EA3C18181* OR *SHA256\=5A456283392FFCEEEACA3D3426C306EB470304637520D72FED1CC1FEBBBD6856*)) OR (md5:"ae8acf66bfe3a44148964048b826d005") OR (sha1:"cea49e9b9b67f3a13ad0be1c2655293ea3c18181") OR (sha256:"5a456283392ffceeeaca3d3426c306eb470304637520d72fed1cc1febbbd6856"))))
